nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.sms

Interface SmsMailingServiceLocal

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Service, SmsMailingService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SmsMailingServiceImpl

    public interface SmsMailingServiceLocal
extends SmsMailingService
    Local interface. It must be used only from other services.

    • Method Detail

      • getSmsTextVariables

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getSmsTextVariables(java.util.List<MemberGroup> groups,
                                                                   Member member,
                                                                   boolean onlyVariableNames)
        Returns SMS text variables with their names, or with their values.
        Parameters:
        groups - Used only with onlyVariableName in true. Only the common custom fields between the specified groups will be taken into account to determine the custom field variables.
        member - Element and custom fields variable values will be taken from this member. Used only with onlyVariableNames in false.
        onlyVariableNames - If true, the method will return a description for each variable.
        Returns:

      • nextMemberToSend

        Returns the next member to send this sms mailing to
